amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding law enforcement and methamphetamine issues in Indian country.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4020 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 23.

action.text: Amendment SA 4020 proposed by Senator Tester to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S959-960; text: CR S959) To express the sense of Congress regarding law enforcement and methamphetamine issues in Indian country.
